Package cz.vutbr.fit.gja.models.exam

Interface ExamServiceDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExamServiceDaoImpl
    public interface ExamServiceDao
    This class encapsulates all methods for the Exam entity

      • setSpacingOfExam

        int setSpacingOfExam​(java.lang.String spacing)
        Sets spacing between students on exam
        Parameters:
        spacing - Spacing as string (no_space|one_space|two_space)
        Returns:
        Spacing as number

      • getExamDto

        ExamDto getExamDto​(Exam exam)
        Gets all exam runs which are related to given exam and wraps it together with given exam to ExamDto object
        Parameters:
        exam - Exam
        Returns:
        Object with exam and hers exam runs

      • checkIfExamRunIsInRoom

        boolean checkIfExamRunIsInRoom​(Room room)
        Checks if there is any exam in given room
        Parameters:
        room - Room
        Returns:
        true - there is some exam in the given room, false - there is not any exam in the given room
